description: Try our easy to follow Sweet Potato & Sausage Risotto recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Risotto,Sausage,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Beef,Soy free,Rice,Sweet potato,Peanut free
name: Sweet Potato & Sausage Risotto Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 300g gold sweet potato, scrubbed, cut into 2cm pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Place sweet potato on a baking paper-lined baking tray. Drizzle with half the oil. Season. Bake for 20 minutes or until tender.
Meanwhile, bring 5 cups water to the boil in a medium saucepan. Crumble in stock cube. Reduce heat to low and keep at a simmer.
Roll sausage meat into small meatballs. Heat remaining oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Cook meatballs for 5 minutes or until browned and just cooked through. Transfer to a plate.

Reheat same pan over medium heat. Add onion and cook, stirring, for 5 minutes or until softened. Add rice, garlic, paprika and two-thirds of the thyme, and cook, stirring, for 1 minute or until fragrant.
Add 1 cup hot stock to rice mixture. Cook, stirring constantly, until stock is absorbed. Repeat until rice is tender and creamy (this will take about 25 minutes), reserving 1/3 cup stock.

Add meatballs to rice mixture with reserved stock. Cook for a further 5 minutes or until meatballs are heated through. Remove from heat. Stir in sweet potato, butter (if using) and most of the parmesan until combined. Serve risotto topped with remaining parmesan and thyme.
